briefTitle: Omega 3 Fatty Acids in Patients With Chronic Renal Disease
officialTitle: Effects of the Supplementation With Omega 3 Fatty Acids in Patients With Chronic Renal Disease
summary: To study the tolerance and efficacy of an omega 3 fatty acids supplement on renal and vascular function and inflammatory parameters in patients with chronic renal disease

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With a Urine Albumin Excretion Decrease of 20% or More
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: At baseline and 12 weeks of intervention
